column1: Wittenheim is a commune in the Haut-Rhin department in Grand Est in north-eastern France. It is one of the northern suburbs of the city of Mulhouse
column2: and forms part of the Mulhouse Alsace Agglomération
column3: the inter-communal local government body for the Mulhouse conurbation. The commune contains two mining villages
column4: the Cité Jeune-Bois and the Cité Sainte-Barbe.
